channel.title: Comments on: “Let’s replace gunfight with 3v3 knife fight
channel.description: Call of Duty: Black Ops Cold War is a first-person shooter video game developed by Treyarch and Raven Software and published by Activision. r/BlackOpsColdWar is a developer-recognized community focused on the title.

item.title: By: samueljerri
item.dc:creator: samueljerri
item.description: I actually love it. Made my last Season 5 challenge ez asf (win gunfight matches).
item.content:encoded: I actually love it. Made my last Season 5 challenge ez asf (win gunfight matches).

item.title: By: hvperRL
item.dc:creator: hvperRL
item.description: Was liking the gunfight tourneys. If anything, there should be face off melee and no knife fight
item.content:encoded: Was liking the gunfight tourneys. If anything, there should be face off melee and no knife fight

item.title: By: DaRk_LeGeNd13
item.dc:creator: DaRk_LeGeNd13
item.description: No no no. The fact that when you get in 3v3 Knife fight, the announcer calls it gun game
item.content:encoded: No no no. The fact that when you get in 3v3 Knife fight, the announcer calls it gun game

item.title: By: 1IIvc3
item.dc:creator: 1IIvc3
item.description: Trying to have fun? Too bad because i’m mr annoying no fun
item.content:encoded: Trying to have fun? Too bad because i’m mr annoying no fun
